jump_scares.spoiler: As Carol closes the closet door, the reflection of a man can briefly be seen in the closet mirror
As Carol turns on a light, a crack opens up on the wall
A lady screams as Carol cuts her finger
Bridget opens Carol’s purse and sees a rotting rabbit’s heart
Hands reach out of the walls to grab Carol while she is in the hallway
Carol turns around a man is lying beside her in bed who then attacks her
Hands once again come out of the walls and attempt to grab Carol
